scripts.build: cd src && find . -name '*.md' | xargs -I % sh -c 'mkdir -p ../public/$(../bin/parseName.js --path %) && echo ../public/$(../bin/parseName.js %).html created && ../bin/createHtmlPage.js % ../public/$(../bin/parseName.js %).html' &&  cd .. && echo 'home directory list' && ls && find . -name '*.html'
